properties.entry: INSERT INTO IMAGE ( FILE_NO , IMAGE_TYPE , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL , FILE_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , DOG_NO , CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_IMAGE.NEXTVAL , 3 , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_TYPE = 3 AND FILE_LEVEL = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RUM, A.* FROM (SELECT FILE_NO , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLEIMG" , DOG_NAME FROM IMAGE JOIN DOG USING(DOG_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND IMAGE_TYPE = 3 ORDER BY FILE_NO) A ) WHERE RUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
